title: RENAME LOGITECH FILES FIX NOT WORKING WHAT NOW???
body:
this fix has worked the last 4 days although i have to keep renaming them everytime i log in now the fix isnt working where do i go from here i just want to play UNREAL TOURNAMENT XD i mean league of legends but seriously please help me
{{champion:106}}

replies.body: Windows 7 home premium alt tab maximizises then minimizes the window instantly ive allowed lol free passage through my firewalls and antivirus then even turned it off I can hear the game in the background yes. {{item:3070}}

What exactly is your issue? Is your mouse/keyboard not working?

If it's purely hardware, ie. it doesn't work for any games, then it would probably be better to go to the support forums for that specific company.

> [{quoted}](name=HORSE OF FORCE,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=qvrYyYXo,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-12T11:23:45.306+0000)
>
> What exactly is your issue? Is your mouse/keyboard not working?
> 
> If it's purely hardware, ie. it doesn't work for any games, then it would probably be better to go to the support forums for that specific company.

no all hardware works what happens is i get through to champ select but when loading screen comes up it flashes then minimizes then if i click on the tab to go to the game it minimizes again instantly the fix for this was to rename 2 logitech files in rads folder but this fix has stopped working!

Woah, slow down a bit there buddy.

So, this is a client issue then, which you resolved by renaming some game-hardware related files in the client's files; now that is not working anymore for an unknown reason. Is that correct?

> [{quoted}](name=HORSE OF FORCE,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=qvrYyYXo,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-03-14T04:57:56.803+0000)
>
> Woah, slow down a bit there buddy.
> 
> So, this is a client issue then, which you resolved by renaming some game-hardware related files in the client's files; now that is not working anymore for an unknown reason. Is that correct?

thas correct and still having this issue please HELP i am having LOL withdrawals

You said taskbar so I'll presume you're on Windows.

Have you tried pressing Alt+Tab to switch focus?

Do you have any firewalls/anti-viruses active which can steal focus?

Can you hear the game in the background?
